Package gobblin.source.extractor.hadoop

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AvroFileExtractor
    A custom type of FileBasedExtractors for extracting data from Avro files.
    AvroFileSource  
    AvroFsHelper  
    HadoopFileInputExtractor<S,D,K,V>
    An implementation of Extractor that uses a Hadoop RecordReader to read records from a FileSplit.
    HadoopFileInputSource<S,D,K,V>
    An implementation of Source that uses a Hadoop FileInputFormat to get a FileSplit per Extractor return by HadoopFileInputSource.getExtractor(WorkUnitState) and a RecordReader to read the FileSplit.
    HadoopFsHelper
    A common helper that extends FileBasedHelper and provides access to a files via a FileSystem.
    HadoopTextInputSource<S>
    An extension to HadoopFileInputSource that uses a TextInputFormat.
    OldApiHadoopFileInputExtractor<S,D,K,V>
    An implementation of Extractor that uses a Hadoop RecordReader to read records from a FileSplit.
    OldApiHadoopFileInputSource<S,D,K,V>
    An implementation of Source that uses a Hadoop FileInputFormat to get a FileSplit per Extractor return by OldApiHadoopFileInputSource.getExtractor(WorkUnitState) and a RecordReader to read the FileSplit.
    OldApiHadoopTextInputSource<S>
    An extension to OldApiHadoopFileInputSource that uses a TextInputFormat.
    OldApiWritableFileExtractor
    An extension of OldApiHadoopFileInputExtractor for extracting Writable records.
    OldApiWritableFileSource
    An extension of OldApiHadoopFileInputSource for sources in Writable format using a FileInputFormat.
